name: Alista
description:
Lucas Anson, a resident of the city of Alista, has been told a secret by his brother Eric, one that will affect every citizen of this city. 

-Alista is a roughly 30-45 minute linear Story-based game.
-Go through areas of Alista and slowly discover what the secret of the city is.
-Dialogue choices are added throughout, allowing you to view different options.
-Interact with objects and the residents.
